Package nars.core

Top-level classes of the system, when running in batch mode

See: Description

    Interface Description
    NARConfiguration
    The architectural definition of a NAR.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandLineNARBuilder
    Interprets command-line arguments as configuration parameters to build NAR's
    DefaultNARBuilder
    Default set of NAR parameters which have been classically used for development.
    NAR
    Non-Axiomatic Reasoner Instances of this represent a reasoner connected to a Memory, and set of Input and Output channels.
    NARBuilder
    NAR design parameters which define a NAR at initialization.
    NARRun
    Run Reasoner
    Param
    NAR Parameters which can be changed during runtime.
    Parameters
    NAR operating parameters.
    Perception  

Package nars.core Description

Top-level classes of the system, when running in batch mode

Package Specification

This package contains the top classes of the system.

NARSBatch: defines the application.

Parameters: collects all system parameters, which can be edited before compiling.

CommandLineParameters: system parameters that used in the command-line version

ReasonerBatch: controls the interaction between the memory and the communication channels.
